name: Mini Golf Club (itch)
description:
Mini Golf Club is a free multiplayer mini golf sports game for all ages. Compete in fast-paced matches for up to 6 players. Challenge real players from around the world or play with your friends. Progress through hundreds of fun levels. Win rewards and customize your ball.

Features:

  • Multiplayer gameplay for up to 6 players.
  • Challenge players online and clash on the course in real-time.
  • Play and have fun with your friends.
  • Relax, take aim and putt in private games.
  • Simple and intuitive controls. 
  • Awesome 3d graphics.
  • Win prizes and customize your ball.
  • Progress through hundreds of holes and courses.

Controls:

  • Hold LMB and move the mouse to aim.
  • Release LMB to strike the golf ball.
  • Scroll to zoom.
  • Press C to switch camera.
  • Press L to toggle the light.
